Reading

I have kept track of the books I have read for quite some time now. I keep highlights of my favorite passages from the books I read and am working to archive those on the site. You can view a full list of all the books I have read here.

Listening

Audiobooks really got me interested in 'reading' several years ago. You can view a full list of all the books I have listened to here.
